r = int(input())
print(3 * r ** 2)

r = int(input(""))
print(3 * r * r)

import sys

r = int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip()) # rstrip() removes the newline character

print(3*r**2) # print(3*r*r) also works

a = int(input())
b = int(input())
c = int(input())
p = (a + b + c) / 2
print((p * (p - a) * (p - b) * (p - c)) ** 0.5)
